heading: Whole Page Content
summary: Free medical care for people fleeing the war in Ukraine Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from Ukraine Representatives of the International Organization for Migration in Romania - IOM Romania provide free medical care to Ukrainians and refugees from other countries. Read more Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka The Ukrainian network of family medicine clinics MedZirka offers free medical services online and offline. After filling in the declaration, you can get free consultations from a family doctor, therapist or pediatrician. Read more Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross Red Cross Romania, with the support of the French Red Cross, opened a Health Promotion Center in Bucharest, where every refugee from Ukraine can receive free medical consultations and access to some medical services. Read more
